text: Florence Parly (born 8 May 1963) is a French politician. She was the Minister of the Armed Forces from 2017 to 2022 under President Emmanuel Macron.. She was Secretary of State for the Budget from 2000 to 2002 under President Jacques Chirac. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Boulogne-Billancourt
title: Florence Parly
